titles.title: A joint resolution approving the location of the Korean War Memorial.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment and with a preamble. With written report No. 100-289.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 543.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House by House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. Report No: 100-516.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.

vote.text: Passed House by Yea-Nay Vote: 404 - 0 (Record Vote No: 31).

bill.summary: 12/2/1987--Introduced. Approves of the location, in the area described in a specified Act as Area I in the District of the Columbia, of a commemorative work to honor members of the armed forces who served in the Korean War.
